column4: I  am having some problems with ping ... i am trying ping www.google.com and getting following error message "ping: unknown host www.google.com"
try running:  gksudo gedit /etc/resolv.conf     delete all text and add this line:   nameserver 8.8.8.8
then save the file, close gedit then close all browsers and rerun
its google's public DNS, it may help
it needs to go in the resolv.conf file   instead of aything you have in there
I tried that ... still same result
ok then the connection beyond is bad, try rebooting the router
I am not sure if thats the problem .. since my IRC is connected using same machine
I am not sure if thats the problem .. since my IRC is connected using same machine
